message:
http://anti-nwomartiallawalerts.grouply.com

Dear Alertistas,



Just writing to announce a new martial law alerts group created by SCMLA member, Larry Alcorn:



Anti-NWO / Martial Law Alerts



Here's the group's description:



Group for awakened Americans. Discussion group for anti-NWO / Ilumminai, Martial Law Alerts by region. The use of HAARP to manipilate weather and cause Earthquakes. The collapse of the American Dollar / Gold and Silver.



The site is hosted by Grouply, which looks like a Facebook-style news feed without all the bells & whistles? (It's definitely more functional than Convore & I'm considering starting a SCMLA group there.)



For those of you looking for more discussion/interaction & are anti-Facebook (& who isn't?), it looks like it might be a good place to hang out?



Kim M.

Organizer

SoCal Martial Law Alerts

http://www.meetup.com/socalmartiallawalerts/messages/boards/thread/10753750
